alert.note: Alert for Barnes; Cass; Griggs; Nelson; Ransom; Richland; Sargent; Steele; Traill (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued December 25 at 10:31AM CST until December 25 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 30 below zero. For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches. * WHERE...Portions of northeast and southeast North Dakota. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Advisory, until noon CST today. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until midnight CST tonight. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Periods of heavy snow will significantly reduce visibility. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall amounts may vary over short distances. Use caution if traveling for the holiday today.
info.instruction: Use caution while outside. Wear appropriate winter clothing. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at dot.nd.gov/travel and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.

area.areaDesc: Barnes; Cass; Griggs; Nelson; Ransom; Richland; Sargent; Steele; Traill
